description: This file defines the OrdersScreen widget for a Flutter mobile application, managing the display of user orders, including their statuses and navigation to detailed tracking screens.

classes.name: OrdersScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays a list of user orders with their statuses and navigation to detailed tracking.

methods.name: _statusLabel
methods.description: Returns a string label for the given OrderStatus.

methods.name: _statusColor
methods.description: Returns a color corresponding to the given OrderStatus.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the OrdersScreen, displaying either a message for no orders or a list of current orders.
